name: MODBA
description:
Exploring new and alternative mediums for curated art experiences. The virtual Museum of Dead Bunny Art  (MODBA) was established April 2020.   The Dead Bunny Society is an independent artist-run initiative based in Johannesburg, South Africa. Established in 2015.   Instagram: @thedeadbunnysociety for more information and updates on the artists that we promote and work with. 

For the prototype MODBA currently features photographic artwork by Stefanie Langenhoven, Minien Hattingh and Laetitia Lups. 

This serves to be a prototype for a virtual gallery during the time of social distancing and COVID-19. 

HOW TO: Use the WASD keys to navigate. Click on the individual artworks with left mouse button to display more information about the artworks. Left click on the text box to make it dissapear. 

UPDATE: Have added clickable links for the artworks that display pop-up information about the individual artworks in question. 

PLANNED FEATURES: please note this is still a very 'early days' prototype. But with that being said the following is a list of planned features for future builds. 

  1.  Better.Lighting.Always.
  2.  more rooms
  3. video
  4. sound
